name: Just In Time (YouHaveTrouble)
description:
Now the reaper just gets mad, but can't just stop working his job because noone will hire them elsewhere.

Music is done by Encode42, you can check his stuff out here. The game would have been silent without him <3

Game made for Godot Wild Jam #38. It's also my first game I've ever made!

You can read about my experience making this game on my blog!
